remarks: Limit of the quotient of two converging functions.  Proposition 12-2.1(a) of [Gleason] p. 168.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
statement:
rlimadd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
rlimadd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
rlimadd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) ~~>r D ) $.
rlimadd.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) ~~>r E ) $.
rlimdiv.7 $e |- ( ph -> E =/= 0 ) $.
rlimdiv.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C =/= 0 ) $.
rlimdiv $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B / C ) ) ~~>r ( D / E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
$d ph x $.
